recipesJson.name: Cran-Orange Muffin
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: It is fall and time for some warm, fresh out of the oven cranberry and orange muffins! I added a touch of soho to warm up the mix and give it a bit of caramel flavor. Don't be scared, it tastes NOTHING like tobacco. If anyone would know its me (I can't stand any hint of tobacco). Fw blood orange is the perfect warm, earthy orange flavor to use in this perfect muffin base of flv lembas bread and flv pound cake. Lembas bread will be available from BCF in a couple of days. Give this a few days to a week to steep. The cranberry comes out a little more and the breads get more, well, bready.

reviews.text: This is a delicious mix! But holy moley, is that Lembas Bread's expensive. The orange and cranberry combo work really well together, not too citrusy and just enough tartness from the cranberries. I was hoping that the muffin part would be a bit more prominent, but that's not a negative. I let it steep for a week and vaped half my sample. I'm curious if it'll change after another week of steeping. With how smooth it is and the mouthfeel I can see this being an ADV. Thanks for the great recipe Emily! :D
